home.intro: Essoly Elyazid, 20 years old, from Casablanca Morocco, I study computer science at ENSAK.

opinions.title: Opinions :
opinions.subtitle: Best way to know someone!
items: Messi is far better than Ronaldo.
Minecraft is the best videogame.
Lichess is better than chess.com.
Harira is the pinnacle of Moroccan cuisine.
Linkin Park are underrated.
Obsidian is better than Notion.
Scrolling and Social media are bad.

interests.title: Interests :
items: I Like playing Chess, sometimes I play Minecraft or Geometry Dash.
I watch Anime and read Manga often.
Mathematics.
Competitive programming.
Music.
Coding! (obviously ...).

currently.title: Currently :
currently.text: I'm focusing on learning Vue.js, some DSA and Data science, and would really like to improve my chess skills if i get the time.

schools.name: Ecole Nationale des sciences appliquées de Kénitra
Ecole Nationale des sciences appliquées de Tétouan
schools.comment: The North has some beautiful landscapes

chess.title: Favorite Chess Openings :
chess.intro: I still dont know any in depth opening theory but :
items: I dislike d4, and usually play some queen's gambit declined or king's Indian variation against it.
Against e4 I usually go with the Caro-Kann, Sicilian Defense, and sometimes e5.
As White, almost 95% of the games I play start with e4, then deviate to some Ruy Lopez or Italian variation if black responds with e5.

additional.title: Additional Info :
items: I'm pretty bad at football, although not catastrophically bad, but we can say normal bad.
I like experimenting with LLMs.
I had a hobby of raising pigeons when i was a kid.
That's what I can think of at the moment.

programming.title: - Programming Languages :
programming.knowledge: Have knowledge in: C, C++, PHP, R.

webdev.title: - Web Dev :
webdev.intro: I know the basics html, css, PHP and JS. For web frameworks and libraries :
webdev.backend: Backend: Laravel, Flask and Interested in Django.
webdev.css: CSS Libraries : Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS, for small projects Pico CSS.
webdev.other: I also worked with other technologies like React and React Native via Expo for Mobile dev.

devops.title: - DevOps :
devops.text: DevOps and Fullstack Web Development are the two main fields im currently interested in, although i only have minimal knowledge of tools like NGINX, Docker and Gitlab im definitely going to dive deeper into this field when i get the chance.

datascience.title: - Data Science :
datascience.text: Basics of : Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib and Seaborn.

gui.title: - GUI Development :
gui.text: I worked with Python Tkinter and Pygame, and planning on seeing Electron or PyQt in the future.

graphics.title: - Graphics and Creative Coding :
graphics.text: I like the Processing project, and a big fan of P5.js.

ai.title: - AI and ML :
ai.text: Not much yet but planning on having minimal knowledge for : TensorFlow, and Scikit-learn.

misc.title: - Misc :
misc.text: Other technologies I know about include: Git for version control, Basic Linux and Bash Scripting commands, UML for software and system design, and much more...

certificates.title: - Certificates:
